thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com
thread.title: Auburn13356

author: Auburn13356
title: Auburn13356
text:
Mostly excellent and satisfactory experience shopping with Groupon.
Groupon's communication with the customer is second to none.
Whenever I got an issue with the merchandise or service that I have purchased and ask Groupon, Groupon steps right in and help me with the quickest and most acceptable resolution.
There is absolutely nothing that can go wrong shopping with Groupon.
